Implement 'Pull' operation for issue #37 - will update working dir

Not hooked up to anything yet...

https://github.com/rtyley/agit/issues/37

Use JGit api FetchCommand (with patch to make transports work...)

need to address exceptions - must still unwrap them

throw nice exception messages

why are there no branches showing?!

Show local branches if there are any, otherwise the remote branches

There seems to be something different about the JGit API clone command
implementation (compared to the hand-rolled one I did) - it doesn't create
refs for remote branches when doing a bare repo.

Use a string to denote Remote, rather than RemoteConfig

I like strongly typed objects but the JGIt API doesn't accept one, it
accepts a string - and RemoteConfig s more than I need.

Change the 'fetch' intent into a 'repo.SYNC' intent to *pull* non-bare (issue #37)

The explicit fetch intent is removed for now - the SYNC intent will still just do a fetch
if it's a bare repo.
Use JGIt API pull command (with the Transport Config Callback tweak)
